attributes.action: srap road tax don`t even think about road tolls,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: alternative is to increase duty on fuel so no one can evade tax. people who do 100000 miles pay for 100000miles. people who do 3000miles pay for 3000miles,this wold be a fairer system. An other point would be the government could do away with a large part of DVLA and save millions

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
